title: Crisis Fatigue, Weekend Eye Bleach 6.5.20
itunes:title: Crisis Fatigue, Weekend Eye Bleach 6.5.20
description:
In episode 645, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Maggie Maye to discuss crisis fatigue, the police reform we really need, what we're watching, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. All This Chaos Might Be Giving You ‘Crisis Fatigue’
  2. Police “Reforms” You Should Always Oppose
  3. Donation Resources
  4. WATCH: Alice Coltrane ft. Pharoah Sanders - Journey In Satchidananda

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
